on reading compounds: 攘夷【ジョウイ】expel the barbarians, expulsion of the foreigners, late Edo period (19th century) revolutionary slogan
攘夷論【ジョウイロン】(late Edo-period) principle of excluding foreigners
撃攘【ゲキジョウ】repulse (e.g. enemy), repelling, driving off
尊攘【ソンジョウ】revere the Emperor; expel the western barbarians (19th century slogan)
